name: Chipotle Chicken Sausage
keywords: chipotle chilies, dark-meat chicken, dairy-free, gluten-free, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon finely chopped chipotle chilies in adobo

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients and mix well. Form sausage mixture into desired shape: cylinders or patties. Chill for up to 5 days, freeze for up to 3 months, or use immediately.
Brush sausages with oil and grill or broil them until browned and cooked through. Or fry them in a little oil until well browned all over.
